document.full_text: anxiety over japan's quake-crippled nuclear reactors has triggered calls from lawmakers and activists for review of u.s. energy policy and for brakes on expansion of domestic nuclear power.
document.title: japan nuclear woes cast shadow over u.s. energy policy
lines_and_colors: anxiety over japan's quake-crippled nuclear reactors has triggered calls from lawmakers and activists for review of u.s. energy policy and for brakes on expansion of domestic nuclear power.
